modShortDescription: Made to blend in with the blocks in the game. The 4x6 one also has a powered version.
modDescription:
Made to blend in with the blocks in the game.

The 4Ã—6 one also has a powered version. You can use his [power door relays](https://7daystodiemods.com/power-door-relay-allows-a-2nd-power-input-for-doors/) with it if you want but the relays require DMT.
